policies.involuntary_refund:
If flight is canceled or itinerary is affected by 3+ hours, or if the new schedule causes a misconnection a refund is permitted.
• Agents must process the refund through their GDS before departure
• Include in the ENDO BOX: INVOL REF
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Agents may reissue on the same flight, or next available flight same day on same carrier/class/route.
• If none available, passenger may choose a flight within ±3 days considering prior criteria
• Reissuance must be done before departure
• Include waiver in the ENDO BOX: INVOL CHANGE
policies.voluntary_refund:
Proceed according to the fare rules listed on the ticket.
• The most restrictive rule must be applied
policies.medical_refund:
Refunds or reissues that fall outside of involuntary policies require written authorization.
• Submit to APG Inside Sales team with supporting documents to: usa@apg-ga.us
policies.name_change:
Minor name corrections permitted via SSR message and copy of passport:
• LAST NAME: 1-letter correction (SR KP LAST NAME CORRECTION TO ...)
• FIRST NAME: 2-letter correction (SR KP FIRST NAME CORRECTION TO ...)
• After SSR message is included, send a screenshot to APG Inside Sales team for verification and confirmation at: usa@apg-ga.us
• Other corrections require escalation
• Escalation emails: usa@apg-ga.us
policies.group_booking:
Groups of 10+ passengers.
• Send your request with preferred itinerary to usa@apg-ga.us
policies.infant_policy: Infants must be accompanied by a guardian.
policies.baggage_policy:
Allowance varies by route/class.
• Valuables must not be in checked bags
• Excess baggage is subject to surcharge — check GDS for pricing details
policies.seat_request_policy:
Operational changes may reassign seats.
• Special meals require 72h notice
• Passengers with reduced mobility should notify carrier in advance
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy: Void can be done within 24 hours after purchase if ticket is purchased at least 7 days prior to scheduled departure.

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
